titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on glass bulbs, designed for sprinkler systems and other release devices.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/26/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on liquid-filled glass bulbs designed for sprinkler systems and other release devices.
